<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660e-6c6c-43ba-2e30-9034ebf2f0f0#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Gizella királyné és Szent István király a koronázási paláston, koronázási palást, 11. század, sematikus rajz.</string>
            <string language="en">Queen Gisela and King Saint Stephen on the coronation cope, coronation cope, 11th century, schematic drawing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Königin Gisela und König Heiliges Stephen auf 
der Krönung werden, Krönung fertig werden, 11. Jahrhundert, 
schematische Zeichnung fertig</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Reine Gisela et Roi Saint Stephen sur le 
couronnement font face, couronnement font face, le 11ème siècle, 
schéma schématique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A rainha Gisela e rei Saint Stephen no coronation 
lida, coronation lida, 11o século, desenho esquemático</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La regina Gisela e re San Stephen sul coronation 
fa fronte, coronation fa fronte, undicesimo secolo, illustrazione 
schematica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βασίλισσα Gisela και βασιλιάς Αγιος stephen 
coronation αντιμετωπίζει, coronation αντιμετωπίζει, 11ος 
αιώνας, σχηματικό σχέδιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La reina Gisela y rey Santo Stephen en la 
coronación hace frente, coronación hace frente, 11mo siglo, gráfico
esquemático</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Ezen a sematikus rajzon az István királyt és Gizellát láthatjuk.</string>
            <string language="en">We can see on this schematic drawing King Stephen and Queen Gisela.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Gizella királynő,  Szent István,  palást,  </string>
            <string language="en">Queen Gisela, Saint Stephen, cope</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wir können auf diesen schematischen zeichnenden 
König Stephen und Königin Gisela sehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous pouvons voir sur ce roi de dessin 
schématique Stephen et la Reine Gisela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós podemos ver neste rei desenhando esquemático
Stephen e rainha Gisela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Possiamo vedere su questo re dissipante schematico
Stephen e regina Gisela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορούμε να δούμε σε αυτόν τον σχηματικό 
βασιλιά stephen και βασίλισσα Gisela σχεδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Podemos ver en este rey que traza esquemático 
Stephen y reina Gisela.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Königin Gisela, Heiliger Stephen, werden fertig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Reine Gisela, Saint Stephen, font face</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A rainha Gisela, Saint Stephen, lida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La regina Gisela, San Stephen, fa fronte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βασίλισσα Gisela, Αγιος stephen, αντιμετωπίζει</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La reina Gisela, Santo Stephen, hace frente</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

        org:Sulinet

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
